discussion.content: Correct Answer should be: Get Device List, Run read-only commands on devices, get task ID and get file ID.

It should be 
Get device list
Run read-only commands on devices
Get task by ID
Get file by ID
https://blogs.cisco.com/developer/network-automation-cisco-dna-center-sdk-2
How do you run commands on device before getting the devices list? Should be the other way found
Wrong, Task ID should be before File ID

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
A Cisco DNA Center script must be written to retrieve a list of interfaces on a switch. Drag and drop the API calls that are needed to return the list of interfaces using the Command Running APIs from the left into the correct sequence on the right.
Select and Place:
//IMG//
Which two features are foundations of a software-defined network instead of a traditional network? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. In traditional network devices control plane and data plane are tightly coupled.
B. is correct.
C. In traditional networks, all configurations are done in individual devices
D. is correct. 
E. Is not correct, there are several application of SDN where the devices are not powerful.

Selected Answer: BD
Happy with B & D as the answer. B is a bit strange in my opinion as it sounds like it could both be true and not true depending on how it's deployed, however A, C and E are all fundamentally wrong so it has to be B and D

questions.answer_description: In traditional networks, control plane and data plane are coupled tightly. It also requires device by device configurations and of course, it uses physical hardware resources to function. Whereas, SDN is based on a software stack. In Cisco SDNs are automated through expressed intent to a software controller.

choices.B: build upon a robust software stack
choices.D: automated through expressed intent to a software controller
choices.A: control plane and data plane are tightly coupled

questions.question_text: A network administrator must troubleshoot a network issue using Cisco DNA Center. Which API request helps to determine issue details, impacted hosts, or suggested actions for the resolution?

discussion.content: A and C are the correct answer

I think answer is A and C.
have checked the below URL, but answer B,D,E was not discoverd.

questions.question_text: Which two network assurance features are provided by the Cisco DNA Center API? (Choose two.)

questions.answer_description:
The Intent API is a Northbound REST API that exposes specific capabilities of the Cisco DNA Center platform. The Intent API provides policy-based abstraction of business intent, allowing focus on an outcome rather than struggling with individual mechanisms steps. The RESTful Cisco DNA Center Intent API uses HTTPS verbs (GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE) with JSON structures to discover and control the network.
Reference:
https://developer.cisco.com/docs/dna-center/#!cisco-dna-center-platform-overview/intent-api-northbound

discussion.content:
https://developer.cisco.com/docs/dna-center/#!cisco-dna-center-platform-overview/intent-api-northbound

Intent API (Northbound)
Events and Notifications (Eastbound)
Integration API (Westbound)
